Title: S11:E7 - Why site reliability is so important (Molly Struve)
Description: In this episode, we're talking about site reliability with Molly Struve, lead site reliability engineer at DEV Community. Molly talks about going from studying aerospace engineering, to becoming an options trader, to then becoming a site reliability engineer. She gets into the history of site reliability, what it is, and what it takes to do it well. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
